/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, teeming with life, stretches out below, flanked by towering buildings on either side. These structures, predominantly red and white, rise high into the sky, their facades reflecting the sunlight. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds, adding to the vibrancy of the scene. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the cityscape. In the distance, a few trees can be seen, their green foliage contrasting with the urban environment. The image is bathed in natural light, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
